item.description:
This is in a movie theatre, so it's technicially a movie. :)

I'll arrive an hour before the show, 7PM, and head in about 7:30PM.

If you choose to join us after for food, PLEASE BRING CASH, as it makes accounting faster and easier.

Full details here for the live radio show simulcast.Â http://www.thisamericanlife.org/cinema

The show will feature stories by Ira Glass, writers David Sedaris and David Rakoff, comicTig Notaro and Snap Judgment host Glynn Washington, plus live music by OK Go. It'll also include things you could never do on the radio, like a new short film by Mike Birbiglia, dance by Monica Bill Barnes & Company, original animation, projected illustration and more. Plus special surprise guests.

Boston locations are full, and off sale, so Randolph is the closest available venue. GET TICKETS NOW!

HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby, behind the escalators, near concessions, with a Meetup sign.
item.name: This American Life LIVE! Things You Can't Do On The Radio
